alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dickinson and west central Marquette Counties through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 218 PM EDT/118 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Witch Lake, or 16 miles northeast of Crystal Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Dickinson and west central Marquette Counties, including the following locations... Silver Lake near Channing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
